languages.text: "Губернатор Руолдо! За кражу моего тела, еретические практики и всестороннее уродство вы приговариваетесь к смерти! Взять его!"
"Governor Ruoldo! For the crimes of stealing my body from me, practising heresy, and all-round monstrousness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Attack!"
languages.original_text: "Губернатор Руолдо! За кражу моего тела, еретические практики и всестороннее уродство вы приговариваетесь к смерти! Взять его!"

traits.locale_text: "Governor Ruoldo! For stealing my body, heretical practices and all-round wickedness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Get him!"
"Governor Ruoldo! For stealing my body, heretical practices and all-round wickedness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Get him!"
"Governor Ruoldo! For the crimes of stealing my body from, practising heresy, and all-round wickedness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Kill him!"
"Governor Ruoldo! For the crimes of stealing my body from, practising heresy, and all-round wickedness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Kill him!"
"Governor Ruoldo! For the crimes of stealing my body from me, practising heresy, and all-round monstrousness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Attack!"
"Governor Ruoldo! For the crimes of stealing my body from me, practising heresy, and all-round monstrousness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Attack!"

languages.text: “罗尔多总督！你偷走了我的身体，犯下了异端恶行与滔天大罪！我在此宣判你死刑！开始攻击！”
languages.original_text: "Governor Ruoldo! For the crimes of stealing my body from me, practising heresy, and all-round monstrousness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Attack!"

traits.locale_text: “罗尔多总督！你偷走了我的身体，犯下了异端恶行与滔天大罪！我在此宣判你死刑！开始攻击！”

languages.text: 「ルオルド総督！{mf|俺|私}の身体を奪い、異端を行い、その他あらゆる非道の罪を犯したことにより、君に死を言い渡す！かかれ！」
languages.original_text: "Governor Ruoldo! For the crimes of stealing my body from me, practising heresy, and all-round monstrousness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Attack!"

traits.locale_text: 「ルオルド総督！{mf|俺|私}の身体を奪い、異端を行い、その他あらゆる非道の罪を犯したことにより、君に死を言い渡す！かかれ！」

languages.text: «¡Gobernador Ruoldo! ¡Por los crímenes de haber sustraído mi cuerpo, cometer actos heréticos y demás monstruosidades generalizadas, queda usted sentenciado a muerte! ¡Atacad!».
languages.original_text: "Governor Ruoldo! For the crimes of stealing my body from me, practising heresy, and all-round monstrousness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Attack!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Gobernador Ruoldo! ¡Por los crímenes de haber sustraído mi cuerpo, cometer actos heréticos y demás monstruosidades generalizadas, queda usted sentenciado a muerte! ¡Atacad!».

languages.text: "Vali Ruoldo! Bedenimi çalmak, kâfirlikte bulunmak ve topyekûn garabetlik suçlarından ötürü ölüme mahkûm edilmiş bulunuyorsun! Saldırın!"
languages.original_text: "Governor Ruoldo! For the crimes of stealing my body from me, practising heresy, and all-round monstrousness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Attack!"

traits.locale_text: "Vali Ruoldo! Bedenimi çalmak, kâfirlikte bulunmak ve topyekûn garabetlik suçlarından ötürü ölüme mahkûm edilmiş bulunuyorsun! Saldırın!"

languages.text: « Gouverneur Ruoldo ! Pour les crimes de m'avoir volé mon corps et de verser dans l'hérésie, ainsi que pour votre monstruosité générale, je vous condamne à mort ! À l'attaque ! »
languages.original_text: "Governor Ruoldo! For the crimes of stealing my body from me, practising heresy, and all-round monstrousness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Attack!"

traits.locale_text: « Gouverneur Ruoldo ! Pour les crimes de m'avoir volé mon corps et de verser dans l'hérésie, ainsi que pour votre monstruosité générale, je vous condamne à mort ! À l'attaque ! »

languages.text: "Gouverneur Ruoldo! Für den Diebstahl meines Körpers, das Betreiben von Ketzerei und Eure grundlegende Ungeheuerlichkeit verurteile ich Euch hiermit zum Tode! Attacke!"
languages.original_text: "Governor Ruoldo! For the crimes of stealing my body from me, practising heresy, and all-round monstrousness, you are hereby sentenced to death! Attack!"

traits.locale_text: "Gouverneur Ruoldo! Für den Diebstahl meines Körpers, das Betreiben von Ketzerei und Eure grundlegende Ungeheuerlichkeit verurteile ich Euch hiermit zum Tode! Attacke!"
